OpenProject 5.0.8

OpenProject 5.0.8 contains several bug fixes:

  • Logging unit costs was not possible in 5.0.7. This has been fixed (#22331).
  • In the wiki page a bug was fixed which prevented wiki pages with non UTF-8 characters from being saved (#22384).
  • Files could not be added to documents (#22351). This has been fixed.
  • Several work package bugs have been fixed (#22003, #22303, #22366).
  • The preview feature for wiki pages, meetings and forum entries has been fixed (#22328, #22322, #22344).
  • Several design issues have been resolved (#22310, #22312, #22347, #22394, #22395, #22307).

In addition new icons for the mobile view have been added (#22341) and several accessibility improvements have been implemented.

For further information on the release, please refer to the Changelog v.5.0.8 or take a look at GitHub.
